tasks.title: Install sandbox-runtime for MCP tool isolation
tasks.description: anthropic-experimental/sandbox-runtime is documented but not installed. This is the primary execution containment layer per BUILDKIT spec L1.4.

tasks.title: Install or document substitute for remote-agentic-coding-system
tasks.description: FlexNetOS/remote-agentic-coding-system is listed as PRIMARY in L1.11 but completely missing from repository.

tasks.title: Install agentgateway for MCP routing
tasks.description: agentgateway/agentgateway is the Agent/MCP traffic plane per L1.7. Currently MISSING.

tasks.title: Configure production Vault (not DEV mode)
tasks.description: Vault is running in DEV MODE with in-memory storage. Production requires persistent storage and proper initialization.
tasks.verification: vault status shows initialized and sealed/unsealed properly

tasks.title: Enable mTLS between services
tasks.description: Step-CA is installed but mTLS is commented out in docker-compose files. Need to generate certificates and enable mTLS.

tasks.title: Enable Kubernetes tools in default shell
tasks.description: kubectl, helm, kustomize are optional (withKubernetes=false). Should be enabled for k8s operations.
tasks.verification: kubectl version --client && helm version && kustomize version

tasks.title: Install Kata Containers for VM-backed isolation
tasks.description: kata-containers is L1.4 default isolation but not installed. Linux x86_64 only.
tasks.platform_notes: Linux x86_64 only, requires nested virt in WSL2

tasks.title: Create Nix packages for AIOS
tasks.description: AIOS is Docker-only. Create Nix derivation for pure Nix environments.

tasks.title: Create Nix packages for AGiXT
tasks.description: AGiXT is Docker-only. Create Nix derivation for pure Nix environments.

tasks.title: Add feature flag system for agent runtime selection
tasks.description: Create .env.agent-runtime.example with AGENT_RUNTIME selection (aios|agixt|refact).
tasks.verification: Feature flag switches between agent runtimes

tasks.title: Create smoke tests for agent runtime components
tasks.description: No integration testing between AIOS, AGiXT, and LocalAI.

tasks.title: Fix ruvector optionalDependencies issue
tasks.description: ruvector packages are optionalDependencies in package.json (may fail silently).
tasks.verification: npm install completes with ruvector packages

tasks.title: Add bytebase for DB CI/CD
tasks.description: bytebase/bytebase is PRIMARY in L1.6 but not installed.

tasks.title: Add neon for preview DBs
tasks.description: neondatabase/neon is PRIMARY in L1.6 but not installed.

tasks.title: Document isolation strategy
tasks.description: Create ADR explaining current isolation (Docker) vs target (sandbox/Kata/Firecracker).
tasks.verification: Document exists and explains upgrade path

tasks.title: Update genai-toolbox vendorHash
tasks.description: genai-toolbox Nix module needs vendorHash from first build.

tasks.title: Add open-lovable UI/codegen tool
tasks.description: firecrawl/open-lovable is PRIMARY in L1.20 but not installed.

tasks.title: Install Firecracker for microVM pools
tasks.description: firecracker is L1.4 burst/high-risk isolation but not installed. Linux x86_64 only.

tasks.title: Add agentic-flow to package.json
tasks.description: ruvnet/agentic-flow is PRIMARY agent devâ†’deploy flow but not installed (Node.js).

tasks.title: Add claude-flow to package.json
tasks.description: ruvnet/claude-flow is PRIMARY swarm orchestration but not installed (Node.js).

tasks.title: Add k3s or kind for local Kubernetes testing
tasks.description: No local Kubernetes cluster for integration testing.

tasks.title: Add vCache for prompt caching
tasks.description: vcache-project/vCache is PRIMARY prompt cache but not installed.

tasks.title: Add prompt-cache utility
tasks.description: messkan/prompt-cache is PRIMARY prompt caching but not installed.

tasks.description: ruvnet/midstream is PRIMARY streaming analysis but not installed.

tasks.title: Add agenticsorg/devops for agentic ops
tasks.description: agenticsorg/devops is PRIMARY agentic ops but not installed.

tasks.description: lightningrodlabs/holochain-runner is reference tool but not installed.
